sentence.value: Donald L. Mallick was an American pilot at the NASA Dryden Flight Research Center from 1963 - 1981.

sentence.value: Mallick attended Penn State University for college, and served in the United States Navy Reserves, and in 1957 he graduated from the University of Florida with his masters degree in engineering.
